Label.en: Remember not to confuse him with St Sulpicius Severus of Bourges, or Sulpicius Severus of Aquitaine (also French monks)
Label.fr: Prends garde à ne pas confondre avec St Sulpicius Severus de Bourges, ou Sulpicius Severus of d'Aquitaine :)
Label.es: Remember not to confuse him with St Sulpicius Severus of Bourges, or Sulpicius Severus of Aquitaine (also French monks)
Label.zh: Remember not to confuse him with St Sulpicius Severus of Bourges, or Sulpicius Severus of Aquitaine (also French monks)

Label.en: Sulpicius actually has an entire order named after him… the Society of the Priests of Saint Sulpice
Label.fr: Il y a en fait tout un ordre  qui porte son nom... la société des prêtres de Saint Sulpice
Label.es: Sulpicius actually has an entire order named after him… the Society of the Priests of Saint Sulpice
Label.zh: Sulpicius actually has an entire order named after him… the Society of the Priests of Saint Sulpice

Label.en: To me, it sounds like a super secret underground spy society!
Label.fr: Si on me pose la question, cela ressemble au nom d'une société super secrète d'agents très secrets !
Label.es: To me, it sounds like a super secret underground spy society!
Label.zh: To me, it sounds like a super secret underground spy society!

Label.en: It wouldn’t be the only mysterious thing about the chapel…
Label.fr: Cela ne serait pas la seule chose mystérieuse à propos de cet endroit…
